body_html: @cdluminate: the TF package would be simple, but I realized today I would have to re-package a bunch of its dependencies, too. It looked like I was going to have to make new packages for protobuf, weakref, bleach, html5lib, markdown, and werkzeug (and possibly some of the sub-dependencies of those packages) in order to satisfy all the dependencies on 16.04. Yuck.

body: @CDLuminate: the TF package would be simple, but I realized today I would have to re-package a bunch of its dependencies, too. It looked like I was going to have to make new packages for `protobuf`, `weakref`, `bleach`, `html5lib`, `markdown`, and `werkzeug` (and possibly some of the sub-dependencies of those packages) in order to satisfy all the dependencies on 16.04. Yuck.
